title: GHome Smart Dimmer Switch Work with Alexa Google Home, Single Pole 2.4GHz Wi-Fi Switch for Dimmable LED CFL INC Light Bulbs, Neutral Wire Required, Not 3 Way, No Hub Required, 4Pack

product_information.Best Sellers Rank: #48,652 in Tools & Home Improvement (See Top 100 in Tools & Home Improvement)  #106 in Dimmer Switches

product_category: Tools & Home Improvement‚Ä∫Electrical‚Ä∫Switches & Dimmers‚Ä∫Wall Switches‚Ä∫Dimmer Switches
feature_bullets: „ÄêEasy to Install„ÄëNeutral wire required. GHome's smart dimmer switch requires 2.4GHz Wi-Fi connection, no separate hub required. Input: 120V~ 60Hz; Output: 120V~ 60Hz, 4A Max. Supports dimmable bulbs up to 480W.

„Äê1% - 100% Dimming with schedule„ÄëEquipped with a sensitive touch interface, just slide your finger to adjust the brightness, and tap button to turn on/off. Set schedules to turn on when arriving home and come on automatically when it is dark.

„Äê Voice Control„ÄëWorks with Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant, so you can control your light using simple voice commands. Enjoy hands-free moments when your hands are full. Note: Not compatible with smart light bulbs.

„ÄêAPP Romote Control „ÄëUsing the APP to light up your house anywthere anytime. You can also view the light status on the app and control them romotely. Set the on/off schedule or default to sunrise/sunset.

„ÄêDimensions„ÄëUL and FCC certified, 2-pack single-pole smart dimmer switch (not 3-way) measures 120mm*70mm*41.3mm (H*W*D). Note: Before using a CFL or LED bulb, please confirm if the bulb is dimmable.

customers_say: Customers find the dimmer switch easy to install and use, with a sleek design and good quality. The functionality and dimming ability receive mixed feedback - while some say it works well with Alexa and is a perfect dimmer, others report it stops working and doesn't work with existing light bulbs. The value for money also gets mixed reviews, with some considering it a great value while others find it not worth the cost.AI Generated from the text of customer reviews

customer_reviews.review_title: 5.0 out of 5 starsQuality product, success at first shot!
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: High quality, super easy to install, perfectly and smoothly integrated to my Smart Life and Google Home apps.Materials seem strong, all is included as a kit for an easy installation including its wall plate.Super fast delivery from Amazon.It is not the first Gosund product I take and integrate to my domotic environment and it is probably not going to be the last.

customer_reviews.review_title: 4.0 out of 5 starsDimmest setting not particularly dim
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 17, 2024
customer_reviews.review_snippet: Easy to physically install. Make sure you have a dedicated 2.4GHz wifi band available. Had lots of trouble registering dimmer switch to my Netgear using simultaneous dual band 2.4 & 5.0 until I off turned the simultaneous broadcast and used dedicated 2.4 band. Then, it was piece of cake. Installed two of these for LED high hats. Dimmest setting is still quite bright. I like that you can slide your finger instead of annoying clicking. Only click is on/off. I'd recommend these.

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: I love them there is no easier way to do this without having a lot of stress, the switch function is supper easygoing.  If you follow the instructions you will have it made.  I love them I have 12 I‚Äôm my home, connected to both Alexa and google, and the original app Goush.  I endorse this product.

customer_reviews.review_title: 1.0 out of 5 starsToo cheap to be any good!
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 4, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: Blew up 1 day after installation into my kid's room switch panel. Tripped my circuit breaker. Scared the stuff out of my kid. Luckily, no damage inside my switch box or my wires. If "too cheap to be any good" is not saying, it should be. Don't trust your home's wiring to this "insert choice word". Go buy brand name dimmer/switches. I guess, I should be glad that it didn't burn down my house (thank you circuit breaker) and it blew w/in 30 days of purchase. At least, I'm getting my money back.

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: Works greatEasy to order and quick delivery

customer_reviews.review_title: 5.0 out of 5 starssimple, modern sleek look, functions well!
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2024
customer_reviews.review_snippet: I love the option to turn the lights off with an app from another room. The dimmer is easy to install, but as described it utilizes a neutral wire. I had to run a new wire since I was replacing a single-pole switch (standard toggle switch).These look simple and modern which is the reason I chose them.
